name: r_pture
description:
🩸 goop loop #3 💧

video loop with sound. footage found on used VHS tape purchased on eBay and manipulated in real-time with a Magnavox VHS player. recorded with Elgato Game Capture HD60 S into OBS studio. video is edited raw capture - no color correction or other post-processing was applied. audio created with miscellaneous synths and effects and recorded, edited and produced in Ableton.
